messages.message: Hi, we were asked by an arabic prospect on the LLM’s ability to read documents; as I understand, these are usually read from right to left. Im curious to understand if our LLMs can understand this nuance in the documents?

We built Invoices and ID Cards App on Arabic, LLM is doing pretty good job here.

Now we are trying to build Arabic Bankstatement. Copying @Pramod Munemanik to share his experience on this.

First, you need to select Arabic language in the OCR settings to get the correct OCR texts. For banking documents, we are facing difficulties with tables, but we are able to extract easily identifiable fields such as account number, statement start date, currency, etc
Hi! Thank you for the responses. Do you have any example arabic bank statement/a project you can share? I’m curious on a tech perspective what is going awy
@Pramod Munemanik how do you turn on arabic language on the OCR settings?

I have project on preprod. here is the refiner.
https://aihub.preprod.instabase.com/apps/refiner-v5/edit/ib-gtm/ib_app_admin/fs/Instabase%[…]890/project/flows/modules/abs.refiner/refiner.ibrefiner (https://aihub.preprod.instabase.com/apps/refiner-v5/edit/ib-gtm/ib_app_admin/fs/Instabase%20Drive/aihub/14184b89-6a8d-4d94-bfd3-8261f40b3890/project/flows/modules/abs.refiner/refiner.ibrefiner)
ooh, this is a custom app, got it

Note that we plan to add support custom languages in AIHub in `24.18.0` so this behavior will be supported without needing a custom app.

cc @hannah
